intro: Polystachya leucorhoda, commonly known as the white-flowered basket orchid, is a species of orchid native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. Polystachya leucorhoda prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil, making it a popular choice for indoor cultivation.
